reviewText:
I have the first one as well.  Keep in mind, this is not an advanced workout by any means.  But if you need a very low-intensity one and like classical music, you should track down at least one of the Conductorcises.  I hope they start making them again.  They're gems.
This is a little over 30 minutes.  You don't need a baton or any other equipment.
I could hear the music which was magnificent; however, I could not see anything. That is why I returned it.
